approvalApplyInfoText: Click 'Apply Now' to begin your 7-minute online application process and be one step closer to receiving your fund
loanApprovedInterestDetailsText: Example shwn based on 3.6% fixed annual rate.All loans are subjected to status and aragement fee between 1.5% - 4.5% of amount borrowed. Loans are subjected to affordability check.
